A warm, quiet teaser visual inside a renovated Showa-era Japanese house in Kagurazaka, used as an independent bookstore and mini gallery â€œTomoshibi Book Lounge.â€  
Soft lamp light and natural light blend gently, illuminating the warm beige tones and the texture of aged wooden surfaces and washi-like paper fibers.

A minimal composition featuring metal movable type blocks, a small ink bottle, and the shadowed edges of thick washi paper.  
Accents include a subtle blurred halo of lamp lightâ€”symbolic of Tomoshibi Book Lounge.  
Textures are tactile and artisanal: slight ink spread, letterpress impression shadows, and a hand-printed unevenness.

2) BADGE (top-right)
